description: Manage proxy address use for network connection.

commands.name: az sphere device network proxy apply
commands.summary: Configure the network proxy on the attached device.
commands.syntax:
az sphere device network proxy apply --address
                                     --authentication
                                     --port
                                     [--device]
                                     [--enable]
                                     [--no-proxy-addresses]
                                     [--password]
                                     [--username]
examples: az sphere device network proxy apply --address contoso.com --authentication basic --port 8080 --username ExampleUsername --password ExamplePassword --no-proxy-addresses badcontoso.com badcontoso2.com --enable
az sphere device network proxy apply --address contoso.com --authentication anonymous --port 8080 --enable --device 192.168.35.2

commands.name: az sphere device network proxy delete
commands.summary: Delete proxy connection on the attached device.
commands.syntax: az sphere device network proxy delete [--device]
examples: az sphere device network proxy delete

commands.name: az sphere device network proxy disable
commands.summary: Disable network proxy on the attached device.
commands.syntax: az sphere device network proxy disable [--device]
examples: az sphere device network proxy disable

commands.name: az sphere device network proxy enable
commands.summary: Enable network proxy on the attached device.
commands.syntax: az sphere device network proxy enable [--device]
examples: az sphere device network proxy enable

commands.name: az sphere device network proxy show
commands.summary: Show proxy connection on the attached device.
commands.syntax: az sphere device network proxy show [--device]
examples: az sphere device network proxy show --device <DeviceIdValue>
